definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: An automatic software-development technique of interactive interface for intelligent instruments is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種智能儀表交互界面的軟件開發自動化技術。

sentences.english: However, asynchronous interaction pushes more complex error handling onto the consumer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，異步交互將更復雜的錯誤處理推給了用戶。

sentences.english: These exist cross-action between specialty and grade. (4) There exist the apparent characteristic on development.
sentences.chinese: 並且學科和年級間存在顯著的交互作用。

sentences.english: The domain level focuses strictly on business interactions viewed from the perspective of the external actor.
sentences.chinese: 域層次嚴格集中在從外部演員的角度看到的業務交互。

sentences.english: Non-interactive items that are included in the control view cannot receive keyboard focus.
sentences.chinese: 控件視圖中包括的非交互式項不能接收鍵盤焦點。

sentences.english: Orchestrating the interactions with several resources becomes slightly more involved.
sentences.chinese: 編排與多個資源的交互是個棘手的問題。

sentences.english: The ideal situation is that partitions do not need to interact with each other at all.
sentences.chinese: 理想情況是這些分區相互之間根本不需要發生交互。

sentences.english: Studying this interaction is one of Cassini's objectives.
sentences.chinese: 這種交互感應的研究是卡西尼的主要目標之一。

sentences.english: You don't have a real user interaction-centric problem.
sentences.chinese: 不存在真正的與用戶交互相關的問題。

sentences.english: Ultimately, sequence diagrams are maps of interaction.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結底，序列圖就是交互圖。

sentences.english: It is easy and quick to prototype interactive widgets and animated transitions.
sentences.chinese: 可以很容易很快地原型化交互小部件和動畫轉換。

sentences.english: Simulation clock pushing is the key technique in DIS.
sentences.chinese: 仿真時鐘的推進是分佈交互式仿真系統的關鍵技術。

sentences.english: Reciprocal teaching is a model of inactive learning's application in reading comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 交互教學就是元認知缺陷觀應用於閱讀教學的典範。

sentences.english: In some instances, human interaction with technology is required for the artwork to come into being.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情況下，人機交互技術有賴於藝術去實現。

sentences.english: A framework for Distributed Gateway(DG) interworking with H. 323 /SIP is described.
sentences.chinese: SIP交互作用的分佈式網關的一種框架。
